page.topic: Attaching a Library to the Current Workspace
page.description: To attach an external library to the current workspace:

step.description: Select the Libraries tab. Alpha Anywhere shows you the list of attached Libraries.

section.description: To add a new Library, click the Add button and select the .alb file that you want to attach. To remove a Library, select the Library and click the Remove button.

page.limitations: Desktop applications only. Not available in Community Edition.
